column4: Jbatista i am running gnacktrack & the drivers have not loaded i run Ubuntu no probs, i have used modprobe etc & it see's the card when i try to bring the card up it will not recog, i found the drivers but need to install but am a new to terminal so the Make install bit has me lost
this channel is only for ubuntu-support
gnutrack is not ubuntu, it's based on ubuntu
so #gnutrack or something else is supportchannel for that
yes, like you told. It's combination, and it's not same thing. So it's not supported here
